about_the_game:
Did you ever want to have all the power over the world? Did you imagine how you could make the world better? Did you do anything to reach your goal? Nature Zen will give you that opportunity. You'll be able to control everything in the world, you'll be like god. Create the perfect world by creating, removing and moving tiles and reach the zen, the nature zen.
Now you think: "That's all?", I say: "No". On every tile there are agents, agents who change the behavior of the world, your world. And saddest thing is that you can't alter their behavior. Thus, extra difficult.

Main Features:
  • An Endless World
  • Strategy Game
  • Keyboard controls combined with mouse controls
  • Real world simulation
  • 2D flat graphics
detailed_description:
Did you ever want to have all the power over the world? Did you imagine how you could make the world better? Did you do anything to reach your goal? Nature Zen will give you that opportunity. You'll be able to control everything in the world, you'll be like god. Create the perfect world by creating, removing and moving tiles and reach the zen, the nature zen.
Now you think: "That's all?", I say: "No". On every tile there are agents, agents who change the behavior of the world, your world. And saddest thing is that you can't alter their behavior. Thus, extra difficult.

Main Features:
  • An Endless World
  • Strategy Game
  • Keyboard controls combined with mouse controls
  • Real world simulation
  • 2D flat graphics

short_description: Nature Zen the first game created by Team Octane. In the game the player plays as god, manipulating the terrain that animals live on. Will you create an ecosystem full of happy animals, or will everything go extinct because of a lack of food in the area.
